Dean’s List (5x), National Honor Society  

---

- Fine-tuned models in SageMaker, improving accuracy by 5% and reducing toxicity by 8%.

- Developed API integration scripts, enhancing system interoperability.

Feb 2024 – May 2024

- Supported VIP users with secure access, maintaining high availability.  

### IT Instructor Assistant  
**RF CUNY & Generation USA (Choose-U)** | Remote, NY

---
